flavor_text: It has black cape-like fur that is very hard and decreases the amount of damage it receives.
It loyally follows its Trainer's orders. For ages they have helped Trainers raise Pokemon.
This very loyal Pokemon helps Trainers and it also takes care of other Pokemon.
